scripts.build:js: terser ./src/js/BorderPaint_v1.js -c -m -o ./docs/js/BorderPaint_v1.js && terser ./src/js/ButtonBG_v1.js -c -m -o ./docs/js/ButtonBG_v1.js && terser ./src/js/index.mjs -c module -m module -o ./docs/js/index2.mjs && terser ./src/js/linkFactory.mjs -c module -m module -o ./docs/js/linkFactory.mjs && terser ./src/js/links.mjs -c module -m module -o ./docs/js/links2.mjs && terser ./src/js/panelFactory.mjs -c module -m module -o ./docs/js/panelFactory.mjs && terser ./src/js/projects.mjs -c module -m module -o ./docs/js/projects2.mjs
scripts.prebuild: rm -rf ./docs && mkdir docs && cd ./docs && mkdir js && cd ../ && cp -r ./src/images ./docs/images && cp ./src/manifest_v1.webmanifest ./docs/manifest_v1.webmanifest
scripts.build: npm run build:html && npm run build:sass && npm run build:js && node ./postprocess.js ./docs/index2.html ./docs/js/index2.mjs ./docs/js/links2.mjs ./docs/js/projects2.mjs
